segments.text: How can she just stand there drying that stupid plate?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water everywhere, and she ignores it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle already; she's going to slip and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are being reckless on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's about to fall grabbing those cookies he shouldn't have.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl encouraging himâ€” what a pair of troublemakers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen's a mess because no one's paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets; this is irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should turn off the faucet right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet with the cookie jar is just inviting this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks peaceful, but inside it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe adults let things get this out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my blood boil.
segments.speaker: PAR
